p: OA has the antioxidation effect, and its mechanism may be related to the antioxidant's generation increase and the expression of oxidative stress-sensitive transcription factors-Nrf2 and MAP kinases [ 61, 62]. Studies have reported that OA exerts neuroprotective effects by inhibiting the activated oxidative stress and inflammatory response of microglia cells associated with Alzheimer's disease [ 63– 65]. In addition, OA also has antiosteoporosis, antiproliferation of prostate cells, antimuscle atrophy, anti-influenza, and antidepression effects [ 66– 70].
